Title: suppress_redundant_updates_trigger
Description: Suppresses do-nothing update operations. See below for details.

Title: tsvector_update_trigger
Description: Automatically updates a tsvector column from associated plain-text document column(s). The text search configuration to use is specified by name as a trigger argument. See Section 12.4.3 for details.

Title: tsvector_update_trigger_column
Description: Automatically updates a tsvector column from associated plain-text document column(s). The text search configuration to use is taken from a regconfig column of the table. See Section 12.4.3 for details.
CREATE TRIGGER ... tsvector_update_trigger_column(tsvcol, tsconfigcol, title, body)
